ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 70
ygData.msgSnippet: and if a friend offered me serpentine bracers and an exe hood i wouldn t take em.  I don t need em at my level and when I get to the appropriate level i want
ygData.messageBody:
and if a friend offered me serpentine bracers and an exe hood i wouldn't
take em. I don't need em at my level and when I get to the appropriate
level i want to go camp for them....it's how the game was meant to be
played and until they change the whole camping system I will continue to
play it in that fashion. Twinkers like you already screwed the
PoF.....whats next....Lower Guk...permafrost.....

you're just a bunch of jerks who don't give a shit about the rest of the
people that play the game....so I can't wait until you get to 50th level
and leave the game cause you have nothing else to do. maybe you can then
go back to UO or whatever jerkoff game you played before you came and
wrecked this one.

Sligo
Cazic Thule
